scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/webapp--adobe-experience-ds/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/webapp--adobe-experience-ds
  set jcr:title{String} to "Design System - Componentes PAN"
end

set ACL for AEM-HML-Author_Aprovador, AEM-HML-Author_Dev, AEM-HML-Author_Editors, AEM-PRD-Author_Aprovador, AEM-PRD-Author_Dev, AEM-PRD-Author_Editors, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Deploy, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Dev, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Owner, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Dev,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Dev,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-HML-Author_Aprovador,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-HML-Author_Dev,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-HML-Author_Editors,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-PRD-Author_Aprovador,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-PRD-Author_Dev,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-PRD-Author_Editors,WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Suporte
 allow jcr:all on /apps/,/libs/
end

set ACL for WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Deploy, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Owner, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Dev
 allow jcr:all on /apps/,/libs/
end

set ACL for WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Deploy, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Owner, WebApp_Adobe_AEM-CManager_Dev
 allow jcr:write on /apps/,/libs/
end
